mapper.sql: SELECT t.REGIME_INFO_ID, t.REGIME_TITLE, t.REGIME_DIGEST, t.COMMIT_ID, t.COMMIT_TIME, t.ORGID, t.REGIME_INFO_TYPE, t.STEP_UP_OPERATION_ID, t.STEP_UP_OPERATION_TIME, t.PRINT_TIME, t.COMMIT_DEPT, t.NUM, t.MARK, t.TYPE_ONE, t.TYPE_TWO, t.SYTEM_FOUR, t.CLASSIFY, t.DELETE_REASON, t.KEY_WORD, t.IS_DELETE, t.CURRENT_STATE, t.CHECKER, r.name_ AS FOLDER_, t.DELETE_TIME, og.pname createName FROM REGIME_INFO T LEFT JOIN REG_FOLDER_INDEX r ON r.id_ = T .folder_ LEFT JOIN og_person og on T.COMMIT_ID = og.pid
mapper.select:
SELECT REGIME_INFO_ID, REGIME_TITLE, REGIME_DIGEST, OU.pname COMMIT_ID, IS_DELETE, regime_info_type, TO_DATE ( commit_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ) AS commit_time, ( SELECT NAME_ FROM reg_folder_index fo WHERE fo.id_ = T .folder_ ) AS parent_name, folder_, checker, CURRENT_STATE, delete_reason FROM REGIME_INFO T LEFT JOIN OG_PERSON ou ON T .commit_id = ou.pid LEFT JOIN REG_FOLDER_INDEX r ON r.id_ = T .folder_ WHERE is_delete = 0
and t.folder_ = #{folder_}
and regime_title like concat(concat('%',#{regime_title}),'%')
and regime_digest like concat(concat('%',#{regime_digest}),'%')
and key_word like concat(concat('%',#{key_word}),'%')
and OU.pname like concat(concat('%',#{commit_id}),'%')
and step_up_operation_time like concat(concat('%',#{step_up_operation_time}),'%')
and delete_time like concat(concat('%',#{delete_time}),'%')
and t.delete_reason = #{delete_reason}
and current_state like concat(concat('%',#{current_state}),'%')
and commit_time >=TO_DATE(TO_DATE( #{params.startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
and commit_time <=TO_DATE(TO_DATE( #{params.endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
order by commit_time desc

SELECT REGIME_INFO_ID, REGIME_TITLE, REGIME_DIGEST, OU.pname COMMIT_ID, IS_DELETE, regime_info_type, DATE_FORMAT ( commit_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) commit_time, ( SELECT NAME_ FROM reg_folder_index fo WHERE fo.id_ = T .folder_ ) AS parent_name, folder_, checker, CURRENT_STATE, delete_reason FROM REGIME_INFO T LEFT JOIN OG_PERSON ou ON T .commit_id = ou.pid LEFT JOIN REG_FOLDER_INDEX r ON r.id_ = T .folder_ WHERE is_delete = 0
and t.folder_ = #{folder_}
and regime_title like concat(concat('%',#{regime_title}),'%')
and regime_digest like concat(concat('%',#{regime_digest}),'%')
and key_word like concat(concat('%',#{key_word}),'%')
and OU.pname like concat(concat('%',#{commit_id}),'%')
and step_up_operation_time like concat(concat('%',#{step_up_operation_time}),'%')
and delete_time like concat(concat('%',#{delete_time}),'%')
and t.delete_reason = #{delete_reason}
and current_state like concat(concat('%',#{current_state}),'%')
and date_format(commit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(commit_time,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endTime },'%Y-%m-%d')
order by commit_time desc

select REGIME_INFO_ID,REGIME_TITLE,REGIME_DIGEST,OU.USERNAME COMMIT_ID,IS_DELETE, (select NAME_ from reg_folder_index fo where fo.id_ = t.folder_) as parent_name, CASE CURRENT_STATE WHEN ('0') THEN '正式' ELSE '试行' END as CURRENT_STATE from REGIME_INFO t left join OG_USER ou on t.commit_id = ou.userid left join REG_FOLDER_INDEX r on r.id_ = t.folder_ where is_delete = 0 and t.folder_ = #{folder_}

select REGIME_INFO_ID,REGIME_TITLE,REGIME_DIGEST,COMMIT_ID,COMMIT_TIME,ORGID,REGIME_INFO_TYPE,CURRENT_STATE， STEP_UP_OPERATION_ID,STEP_UP_OPERATION_TIME,PRINT_TIME,COMMIT_DEPT,NUM,MARK,TYPE_ONE,TYPE_TWO, SYTEM_FOUR,CLASSIFY,DELETE_REASON,KEY_WORD,IS_DELETE,CURRENT_STATE,CHECKER,r.name_ as FOLDER_,DELETE_TIME from REGIME_INFO t left join REG_FOLDER_INDEX r on r.id_ = t.folder_ where IS_DELETE = 0 and regime_info_id=#{regime_info_id}
mapper.delete:
delete from REGIME_INFO where regime_info_id in
#{regime_info_id}
mapper.select: select distinct p.pId,p.pname from OG_PERSON p left join REGIME_INFO r on p.pid = r.checker where p.pname is not null and p.pname like '数据中心%'
mapper.insert:
insert into REGIME_INFO
regime_info_id, commit_id, commit_time, regime_title, key_word, print_time, checker, regime_digest, type_one, type_two, regime_info_type, folder_, sytem_four, classify, current_state, mark, num, is_delete
#{regime_info_id}, #{commit_id}, #{commit_time}, #{regime_title}, #{key_word}, #{print_time}, #{checker}, #{regime_digest}, #{type_one}, #{type_two}, #{regime_info_type}, #{folder_}, #{sytem_four}, #{classify}, #{current_state}, #{mark}, #{num}, #{is_delete},
mapper.select: select name_ from REG_FOLDER_INDEX where id_= #{selecttreeId}

SELECT REGIME_INFO_ID, REGIME_TITLE, REGIME_DIGEST, OU.pname COMMIT_ID, IS_DELETE, regime_info_type, TO_DATE ( commit_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ) AS commit_time, ( SELECT NAME_ FROM reg_folder_index fo WHERE fo.id_ = T .folder_ ) AS parent_name, folder_, checker, CURRENT_STATE, delete_reason FROM REGIME_INFO T LEFT JOIN OG_PERSON ou ON T .commit_id = ou.pid LEFT JOIN REG_FOLDER_INDEX r ON r.id_ = T .folder_ WHERE is_delete = 0 and current_state in ('7','8','9')
and t.folder_ = #{folder_}
and regime_title like concat(concat('%',#{regime_title}),'%')
and regime_digest like concat(concat('%',#{regime_digest}),'%')
and key_word like concat(concat('%',#{key_word}),'%')
and OU.pname like concat(concat('%',#{commit_id}),'%')
and step_up_operation_time like concat(concat('%',#{step_up_operation_time}),'%')
and delete_time like concat(concat('%',#{delete_time}),'%')
and t.delete_reason = #{delete_reason}
and current_state =#{current_state}
and commit_time >=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( #{params.startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
and commit_time <=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( #{params.endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
order by commit_time desc

SELECT REGIME_INFO_ID, REGIME_TITLE, REGIME_DIGEST, OU.pname COMMIT_ID, IS_DELETE, regime_info_type, DATE_FORMAT ( commit_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) commit_time, ( SELECT NAME_ FROM reg_folder_index fo WHERE fo.id_ = T .folder_ ) AS parent_name, folder_, checker, CURRENT_STATE, delete_reason FROM REGIME_INFO T LEFT JOIN OG_PERSON ou ON T .commit_id = ou.pid LEFT JOIN REG_FOLDER_INDEX r ON r.id_ = T .folder_ WHERE is_delete = 0 and current_state in ('7','8','9')
and t.folder_ = #{folder_}
and regime_title like concat(concat('%',#{regime_title}),'%')
and regime_digest like concat(concat('%',#{regime_digest}),'%')
and key_word like concat(concat('%',#{key_word}),'%')
and OU.pname like concat(concat('%',#{commit_id}),'%')
and step_up_operation_time like concat(concat('%',#{step_up_operation_time}),'%')
and delete_time like concat(concat('%',#{delete_time}),'%')
and t.delete_reason = #{delete_reason}
and current_state =#{current_state}
and date_format(commit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(commit_time,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endTime },'%Y-%m-%d')
order by commit_time desc
